Articles.Content: I used to play the old ksp on the PC, and now I'm playing it on Xbox. I have looked at the forums and wiki before.

Hello Fearless leader and welcome (back) to the KSP Forums!

These forums and the KSP Wiki are both absolutely invaluable resources.  Glad to have you aboard!

Happy landings!

Welcome Fearless!

Fid XBOX bring you back?
